definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: But I don't see many battery cars.
sentences.chinese: 但是我沒看到許多電瓶車。

sentences.english: Most transport is done by electrified waggons.
sentences.chinese: 大部分貨物都用電瓶車運送。

sentences.english: The lift and car battery supporting converted special equipment for high-altitude operation.
sentences.chinese: 由升降機和電瓶車配套改裝而成的高空作業專用設備。

sentences.english: The sprayer truck can be miniaturized when the utility model is arranged on a handcart or an electric vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 將其放置在手推車或電瓶車上即可使灑水車小型化。

sentences.english: Battery cars use electric energy as their driving force, which is clean and environmentally friendly.
sentences.chinese: 電瓶車是靠電能作爲動力的，安靜環保。

sentences.english: Occasionally borrow other people's electric vehicles, to Zhangjiagang urban forward.
sentences.chinese: 偶爾借過旁人的電瓶車，往張家港的市區前行。

sentences.english: We specially manufacture and export electric scooter goods.
sentences.chinese: 我們是專業出口和生產電瓶車的企業。

definition: shuttle bus ferrying passengers between train stations on two different rail lines
to ride (in a car or carriage)/to drive/to motor
Cape Eluanpi or Eluanbi, southernmost point of Taiwan Island
(visitor, tour, audio etc) guide/guided tour/(site) navigator/to guide
to make a detour/to take the long route
Suhua Highway, coastal road in northern Taiwan, built on the side of cliffs above the Pacific Ocean
